docs.snippet: Defending champion Andy Murray posted another straight-set victory to reach the fourth round at Wimbledon on Friday, beating Roberto Bautista Agut 6-2, 6-3, 6-2....
docs.lead_paragraph: Defending champion Andy Murray posted another straight-set victory to reach the fourth round at Wimbledon on Friday, beating Roberto Bautista Agut 6-2, 6-3, 6-2.

headline.print_headline: Mountain Lion Scares Shoppers in Utah
headline.main: Mountain Lion Scares Shoppers in Utah

docs.snippet: Utah authorities captured a mountain lion Friday that startled people but didn't hurt anybody at a shopping center in a Salt Lake City suburb....
docs.lead_paragraph: Utah authorities captured a mountain lion Friday that startled people but didn't hurt anybody at a shopping center in a Salt Lake City suburb.

headline.print_headline: Exclusive-Loophole for Condensate Exports May Apply to Other U.S. Crudes - Sources
headline.main: Exclusive-Loophole for Condensate Exports May Apply to Other U.S. Crudes - Sources

docs.snippet: The U.S. decision allowing minimally processed super-light oil known as condensate to be freely exported may open the door to doing the same with other types of crude too, according to industry and government sources who have reviewed the ruling....
docs.lead_paragraph: The U.S. decision allowing minimally processed super-light oil known as condensate to be freely exported may open the door to doing the same with other types of crude too, according to industry and government sources who have reviewed the ruling.

headline.print_headline: Bad-Boy Fognini Crashes Out With Volley at Wimbledon
headline.main: Bad-Boy Fognini Crashes Out With Volley at Wimbledon

docs.snippet: Fight to the last point is the mantra drilled into aspiring champions but Italian Fabio Fognini took a different approach in his five-set defeat by Kevin Anderson at Wimbledon on Friday....
docs.lead_paragraph: Fight to the last point is the mantra drilled into aspiring champions but Italian Fabio Fognini took a different approach in his five-set defeat by Kevin Anderson at Wimbledon on Friday.

headline.print_headline: Pope Cancels Local Trip, Vatican Says No Cause for Concern
headline.main: Pope Cancels Local Trip, Vatican Says No Cause for Concern

docs.snippet: Pope Francis canceled a visit to patients at a Rome hospital at the last minute on Friday because of what the Vatican called a "sudden indisposition"....
docs.lead_paragraph: Pope Francis canceled a visit to patients at a Rome hospital at the last minute on Friday because of what the Vatican called a "sudden indisposition".

headline.print_headline: Recalls This Week: Wine Openers, Bicycles
headline.main: Recalls This Week: Wine Openers, Bicycles

docs.snippet: A line of devices used to puncture a hole in a wine bottle cork are being recalled because they can cause the bottle to burst or crack. Other consumer products recalled this week include faulty bicycles and air conditioning systems with improper g...
docs.lead_paragraph: A line of devices used to puncture a hole in a wine bottle cork are being recalled because they can cause the bottle to burst or crack. Other consumer products recalled this week include faulty bicycles and air conditioning systems with improper grounding.

headline.print_headline: Yemen Ceasefire Breached as Violence Flares Anew
headline.main: Yemen Ceasefire Breached as Violence Flares Anew

docs.snippet: Fierce clashes erupted between rebels and tribes backed by an army unit in a northern Yemeni city close to the capital on Friday, breaching a week-old ceasefire, a Defense Ministry official said, as the country's leaders said assailants were plott...
docs.lead_paragraph: Fierce clashes erupted between rebels and tribes backed by an army unit in a northern Yemeni city close to the capital on Friday, breaching a week-old ceasefire, a Defense Ministry official said, as the country's leaders said assailants were plotting to destabilize the country.

headline.print_headline: Navy: Human Error Partly to Blame for Drone Crash
headline.main: Navy: Human Error Partly to Blame for Drone Crash

docs.snippet: Human error and a malfunctioning control system are to blame for a November drone accident off the coast of Southern California that injured two sailors and caused $30 million in damage to a warship, the Navy said in a newly unclassified report....
docs.lead_paragraph: Human error and a malfunctioning control system are to blame for a November drone accident off the coast of Southern California that injured two sailors and caused $30 million in damage to a warship, the Navy said in a newly unclassified report.

headline.print_headline: Texas Lawmaker Warns Against Hedge Funds 'Flipping' Energy Future Unit
headline.main: Texas Lawmaker Warns Against Hedge Funds 'Flipping' Energy Future Unit

docs.snippet: A powerful Texas state senator warned against a takeover by hedge funds of the power distribution unit of bankrupt Energy Future Holdings and said the state would prefer an owner with a long-term view....
docs.lead_paragraph: A powerful Texas state senator warned against a takeover by hedge funds of the power distribution unit of bankrupt Energy Future Holdings and said the state would prefer an owner with a long-term view.
